title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description:
Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor

MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, there is no visual indication that the update is in progress.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the update process.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Perform an export Zip operation.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose desired file types.
5. Click on the "OK" button.
